name: Fantasmi/Ghosts
description:
Same thing, in a room
Sittin' by myself, findin' heaven soon
Many things that will trouble you
Look beyond for a feelin' like you never knew
Reachin' out, huntin' for the truth
Kids See Ghosts - Kids See Ghosts

I've been keeping this coffee bar for years,
and I've seen ghosts for even longer.

One day, a dear old friend of mine sent me a letter.
It reminded me of three meetings I had in the past.
Three different ghosts,
And the issues they hid within them.
(Please, note that the demo only contains the first one!)



Fantasmi/Ghosts is my first game as a mainly solo developer.
Even if for now it's only a demo,
it's my ninth released game
and represents all the time I've spent developing with Team SolEtude.
I decided to release it on my 24th birthday
because for me it marks the beginning of a new period.
Both for me and the team.
Please, while playing this game
don't look for clever storytelling,
don't look for specific meanings,
just experience it as a liberating poem.



Art, Writing, Directing and Sounds by
Rinkaku
